info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:20PM EDT by NWS Miami FL
info.description:
At 220 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Loxahatchee Groves, or near Wellington, moving east at 20 mph.
HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 50 mph.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects.
Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens, Lake Worth, Riviera Beach, Palm Beach, Juno Beach, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, Palm Springs, North Palm Beach, Lake Park, Haverhill, Cloud Lake, Palm Beach International Airport, Port Of Palm Beach, Golden Lakes, Loxahatchee Groves, Lion Country Safari Park, and Gun Club Estates.
info.instruction:
These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

parameter.value: A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Palm Beach County through 300 PM EDT

area.areaDesc: Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County; Coastal Palm Beach County
